intro.title: Your Timeline Story
intro.text: A chronological journey through your chapters

chapters.title: The Beginning
content: This is where your first chapter begins. You can write multiple paragraphs here, and each one will be displayed separately.
You can add as much text as you'd like. This template supports multiple paragraphs for each chapter.
Feel free to describe the events, characters, or key moments that happen in this chapter.
chapters.metadata: Optional: Add dates, locations, or other metadata here

chapters.title: Rising Action
content: As the story progresses, tensions begin to rise. This is your second chapter where you can describe the developing plot.
The narrative continues to unfold, revealing more about the characters and their motivations.
Each chapter can have its own unique image and content that helps tell your story.

chapters.title: The Climax
content: This is the pivotal moment in your timeline. The climax of your story where everything comes together.
Describe the key events, the turning point, and the resolution of major conflicts.
You can customize each chapter with different lengths of content.
chapters.metadata: A crucial moment in the timeline

chapters.title: Resolution
content: The final chapter brings closure to your timeline. Here you can wrap up the story and provide final thoughts.
Describe how everything concludes and what the future holds for your characters or events.
This template makes it easy to add, remove, or reorder chapters by editing the JSON file.
